data.text:
Women are rapidly becoming the driving forces. Previously, women were limited in what they could do, what they could say, where they could work, or where they could go. Nowadays, women have found their foot in male-dominated careers, including politics. Rima Horton is among the women who have found their footing in the political world. So who is she?

Rima Elizabeth Horton Rickman is an English former Labour party councillor on the Kensington and Chelsea London Borough Council. During her tenure, she served as the chief whip and spokesperson on educational matters. Politics aside, she has also served as the senior lecturer for economics at Kingston University.

Quick facts about Rima Horton you should know

How old is Rima Horton? Who are Rima Horton's children? Is she even married? These are some of the questions you might be asking yourself. Here are 5 quick facts about Alan Rickman's ex-wife that you should know

1. Rima Horton is 75 years old

How old is Rima Horton? She was born on January 31, 1947, and she is 75 years old as of 2022. Rima was born into a working-class family in the Bayswater neighbourhood of London. The name of her mother is Elice Irene while that of her father is Wilfred Stewart Horton. She is the third born in a family of four.

She is of British nationality and a Welsh English ethnicity. Horton was born on a Friday, and her zodiac sign is Aquarius.

2. She started performing in theatre when she was only 15

Which schools did Rima Horton attend? For her early education, Horton attended the co-Ed private St. Vincent's primary school. She then enrolled at the City of London School for Girls. After graduating from high school, she enrolled at the University of Southampton.

Horton had a deep passion for theatre since she was a small child. She performed in theatre at school and then in several amateur groups, including the Brook Drama Club that took her to Paris in 1962 when she was 15.

Fellow members reported that she already had a strong presence and a real talent for directing the group. At 18, she won the Most Promising Youngster Award at the Southhall Music & Drama Festival, where young Alan Rickman acted beside her.

3. Rima Horton is married to Alan Rickman

Rima is happily married to Alan Rickman. Her husband is a famous British actor renowned for his role in the Harry Potter movie franchise. How did Alan Rickman meet his wife? Rickman met actor Rima Horton in 1965 when they both found themselves in an amateur theatre group at Chelsea College of Arts. They started dating immediately.

At that time, she was 18, and he was 19. They moved in together in 1977. Rima Horton and Alan Rickman dated for more than for more than three decades before getting married in an intimate private ceremony in New York City in 2012. By that time, Horton was already 65 years, and Rickman was 66 years old.

The wedding was great because no one was invited. After the wedding, they took a walk and had lunch. Their marriage became a public affair three years afterwards, in 2015. They stayed together from 1977 until Alan was promoted to glory in January 2016.

4. Rima has no children

Was the couple ever blessed with kids? Did Alan Rickman have any children? Unfortunately, the couple never had any children. Alan expressed his views and said that he was not the only one involved. He stated that he would have loved to have a family and he would have been a great parent. However, he was forced put his dreams about having kids aside because of his wife.

5. Rima Horton has an impressive net worth

Rima boasts of a successful career as a politician and she has served in various capacities before she retired. She has amassed a significant amount of wealth as a politician. So how rich is she in 2022? Her net worth is estimated at $10 million.

She has boosted her bank account with the salary she has received as the Labour Party Councillor and chief whip, among other political appointments.

So there you have it. The five quick facts about Rima Horton, Alan Rickman's ex-wife that you probably didn't know about. She is the political stallion who dared to be all she desired to be in this world. Rima is a source of inspiration to women who aspire to pursue a career in politics.
